Title: Requires further source separation of certain waste in cities with a population of one million or more
Summary: Requires further source separation of certain waste which is eligible to be redeemed under the provisions of the environmental conservation law relating to beverages which are redeemable for cash in cities with a population of one million or more.
LawCode: Amd ยง120-aa, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to requiring further source separation of waste in cities with a population of one million or more
